casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Lyantie TOWNSEND, as Personal Representative for the Estate of Frank Townsend. No. 13-1191. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 118 So.3d 844.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District, denied.
